name: @shadlib/awaitable
description: An approximately minimal Promise implementation in with copious debug output
author: Shad Sterling <me@shadsterling.com>

scripts.redeps: npm run reset && npm run deps
scripts.reaudit: npm run reset && npm run deps && npm run audit
scripts.dbuild: npm run deps && npm run audit && npm run build
scripts.rebuild: npm run reset && npm run deps && npm run audit && npm run build
scripts.blint: npm run audit && npm run build && npm run lint
scripts.relint: npm run reset && npm run deps && npm run audit && npm run build && npm run lint
scripts.test:debug: npm run blint && mocha --reporter mocha-multi --reporter-options mocha-multi=mocha-multi.json --recursive build/test/**/*.spec.js --inspect
scripts.retest:one: npm run reset && npm run deps && npm run audit && npm run build && npm run lint && npm run test:one
scripts.ctest:one: npm run clean && npm run audit && npm run build && npm run lint && npm run test:one
scripts.btest:one: npm run audit && npm run build && npm run lint && npm run test:one
scripts.test: : Run tests and generate coverage reports                                      ; echo "Running Tests" && ./timeout.sh 300 nyc --reporter html --reporter json mocha --cache --all --include-all-sources --reporter mocha-multi --reporter-options mocha-multi=mocha-multi.json build/test -x build/test && echo "Tests Complete"
scripts.ltest: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.btest: npm run audit && npm run build && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.dtest: npm run deps && npm run audit && npm run build && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.retest: npm run reset && npm run deps && npm run audit && npm run build && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.cover: : Run tests and generate coverage reports                                      ; echo "Generating Coverage Reports" && ./timeout.sh 300 nyc report --reporter html --reporter json && echo "Reports Complete"
scripts.bcover: npm run audit && npm run build && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run cover
scripts.dcover: npm run deps && npm run audit && npm run build && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run cover
scripts.bdoc: npm run audit && npm run build && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run cover && npm run doc
scripts.redoc: npm run reset && npm run deps && npm run audit && npm run build && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run cover && npm run doc
scripts.open: open reports/mochawesome/mochawesome.html && open coverage/index.html && open doc/index.html
scripts.docopen: npm run doc && npm run open
scripts.topen: npm run test && npm run cover && npm run doc && npm run open
scripts.lopen: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run cover && npm run doc && npm run open
scripts.bopen: npm run audit && npm run build && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run cover && npm run doc && npm run open
scripts.copen: npm run clean && npm run audit && npm run build && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run cover && npm run doc && npm run open
scripts.dopen: npm run deps && npm run audit && npm run build && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run cover && npm run doc && npm run open
scripts.reopen: npm run reset && npm run deps && npm run audit && npm run build && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run cover && npm run doc && npm run open
scripts.tready: npm run test && npm run cover && npm run doc && npm run ready
scripts.bready: npm run audit && npm run build && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run cover && npm run doc && npm run ready
scripts.reready: npm run reset && npm run deps && npm run audit && npm run build && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run cover && npm run doc && npm run ready
scripts.start: echo nothing to start - this is a library
scripts.restart: npm run rebuild && npm run start
